attributes.action: Make all pensions payable on a monthly rather than a 4 weekly basis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having pension payments coming into ones account on various days on the month makes it very difficult to budget when on a low income, as all bills, such as utilities and council tax are due to be paid on the same day each month by direct debit.

This would not cost the government any more and would ease the problem of budgetting for people on low incomes
